2.7.0.commit_description: Update against x264 Git, add 4K option, switch to app thread management default rather than set outside, adjust slow option. Fixes: https://github.com/phoronix-test-suite/test-profiles/issues/221 Fixes: https://github.com/phoronix-test-suite/test-profiles/issues/189

2.6.1.commit_description: No need to download nasm anymore since v2.6.0 switched to system nasm.

2.6.0.commit_description: Update against upstream, use system nasm.

2.5.0.commit_description: Update x264 against newer build, should help with compiling on GCC8.

2.4.0.commit_description: Update against upstream x264 to fix build problem on Linux with newer GCC compiler.

2.3.0.commit_description: Update against latest upstream x264, also switch to new video source for mirror.

2.2.1.commit_description: Build nasm internally within the test profile

2.2.0.commit_description: Update x264 snapshot, now require nasm

2.1.0.commit_description: Update x264 against upstream daily snapshot.

2.0.0.commit_description: Update against latest daily snapshot as previous snapshot was more than one year old.

1.9.0.commit_description: Update x264 against latest upstream code.

1.8.1.commit_description: Add --disable-opencl to build configure as its not used and causes build issues out of the box on Fedora.

1.8.0.commit_description: Update against latest daily snapshot of x264: 9 January 2014.

1.7.0.commit_description: Update upstream x264 software against 2013-06-08 snapshot.

1.6.0.commit_description: Update x264 against upstream 2013-05-14 release. Motivated by GCC 4.8 issues with previous release.

1.4.0.commit_description: Update x264 application against upstream snapshot 2012-10-03.
